## Description {#details}

Helper for mapping JSON objects onto protocol structs.

Example: 
<ProgramListing>

<CodeLine><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/json/#a46df0e111acfe74d856f9946d05faa4a">fromJSON</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a066e2a31a13d6520e52ae1944f194662">Value</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>, MyStruct &amp;R, Path P) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="#a1c2fa6005ddb8f8653442a66030c3418">ObjectMapper</a> O(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>, P);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// When returning false, error details were already reported.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> O &amp;&amp; O.map(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;mandatory&#95;field&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a>.MandatoryField) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">      O.mapOptional(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;optional&#95;field&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a>.OptionalField);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>

### operator bool() {#ac923c001e98a5cbef057f1cce8f55331}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="llvm::json::ObjectMapper::operator bool () const"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
True if the expression is an object.

Must be checked before calling <a href="#a33610630c430c0fcc1ae2e7a3888162c">map()</a>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/json-h/#l00852">852</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/json-h">JSON.h</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### map() {#a33610630c430c0fcc1ae2e7a3888162c}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename T&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>bool llvm::json::ObjectMapper::map (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringliteral">StringLiteral</a> Prop, T &amp; Out)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Maps a property to a field.

If the property is missing or invalid, reports an error.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/json-h/#l00856">856</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/json-h">JSON.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### map() {#a88bc931bd7a237b61751584c38a11890}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename T&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>bool llvm::json::ObjectMapper::map (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringliteral">StringLiteral</a> Prop, std::optional&lt; T &gt; &amp; Out)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Maps a property to a field, if it exists.

If the property exists and is invalid, reports an error. (Optional requires special handling, because missing keys are OK).

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/json-h/#l00867">867</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/json-h">JSON.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### mapOptional() {#a3b5125d17ddf2fa1cac7ec76356aa07b}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename T&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>bool llvm::json::ObjectMapper::mapOptional (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringliteral">StringLiteral</a> Prop, T &amp; Out)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Maps a property to a field, if it exists.

If the property exists and is invalid, reports an error. If the property does not exist, Out is unchanged.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/json-h/#l00878">878</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/json-h">JSON.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
